links.*: The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)

wikitext.*:
'''Gerard Murphy''' ([[14 October]], [[1948]]-[[26 August]], [[2013]]) was the narrator of the [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)|1981 radio series of ''The Lord of the Rings'']], broadcasted on the [[BBC|BBC 4]]. Murphy, a Shakespearian actor, has appeared in guest roles in numerous British TV-series, such as ''Dr. Who'', ''Dalziel & Pascoe'' and ''Waking the Dead''.
